name: First Associates
overview:
First Associates Loan Servicing, LLC. (www.1stassociates.com) is one of the nation’s premier consumer loan servicing firms with over 25 years of servicing experience, outstanding technology and the infrastructure and scale to meet the demands of banks, credit unions, schools, finance companies, and other credit providers.

First Associates services loans from multiple asset classes including; private student loans, retail installment contracts, automotive, RVs, manufactured homes, mobile homes, tax lien loans, green and solar technology loans, unsecured medical, commercial loans, military loans, performing and non-performing loans.

In addition, we provide back-up servicing on all consumer lending assets for private and public securitizations and lending facilities.

First Associates specializes in high-touch assets and offers a highly flexible servicing platform based on the latest technologies.
